text: The following lists events that happened during 2004 in Cape Verde. ==Incumbents== *President: Pedro Pires *Prime Minister: José Maria Neves ==Events== *July 3: Local elections took place in the municipalities ==Arts and entertainment== *Germano Almeida's book O mar na Lajinha published ==Sports== *Sport Sal Rei Club won the Cape Verdean Football Championship ==Deaths== *Ildo Lobo (b. 1953), singer ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in Cape Verde Category:2000s in Cape Verde Cape Verde Cape Verde
title: 2004 in Cape Verde
